actions.text: On agreeing to the Bartlett amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 279 (Roll No. 392).

description: Amendment sought to delete funding for payment of United Nations debt arrearages.
purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to strike funding for payment of arrearages to meet obligations of membership in the United Nations, and to pay assessed expenses of international peacekeeping activities.
